Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Ndithudi Mulungu adzawalowetsa anthu okhulupirira ndi ochita ntchito zabwino, m’minda yothiriridwa ndi mitsinje yoyenda. Iwo adzavekedwa zibangiri za golide ndi mphete za nkhombe ndipo zovala zawo zidzakhala za silika
Iwo ndi otsogozedwa ndi mawu abwino ndipo adatsogozedwa ku njira ya Iye amene ayenera kutamandika kwambiri

Ndithudi! Iwo amene sakhulupirira ndipo amaletsa anzawo kutsatira njira ya Mulungu ndi kupita ku Mzikiti woyera umene tidaupereka kwa anthu a mitundu yonse, kaya ndi eni dziko kaya ndi alendo chimodzimodzi ngati amachita zoipa m’kati mwake, tidzamulawitsa chilango chowawa
